item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Can anyone help me with a code that does sendMessageToAll for a certain player rights? So that you can type in a code like ::yelltoadmin (substring here)

[code] public void process() {
if (messageToAll.length() > 0) {
int msgTo = 1;

        do {
            if (players[msgTo] != null) {
                players[msgTo].globalMessage = messageToAll;
            }
            msgTo++;
        } while (msgTo < maxPlayers);
        messageToAll = "";
    }[/code]

That’s the code for it in PlayerHandler. I’m guessing you would have to change the part (msgTo < maxPlayers) But I’m not exactly sure how to do it. maxPlayers just seems like the amount of players online, but i don’t know how to change it so that it sends it to the amount of admins online. Iv’e been messing with this code for other things, like displaying mods online for the player menu, and sending interfaces to certain people. It’s hard to put it all together. If anyone helps me out, it would be much appreciated. I’ve been working on this stupid sort of thing for a while now.
